Kingdom.name: {=scotland_kingdom_name}Kingdom of Scotland
Kingdom.title: {=scotland_kingdom_title}Kingdom of Scotland
Kingdom.text: {=scotland_kingdom_text}Scotland was a sovereign state in northwest Europe traditionally said to have been founded in 843. Its territories expanded and shrank, but it came to occupy the northern third of the island of Great Britain, sharing a land border to the south with the Kingdom of England. It suffered many invasions by the English, but under Robert the Bruce it fought a successful War of Independence and remained an independent state throughout the late Middle Ages.
